msg.title: Birthday Wish
msg.body: Mate, Happy Birthday. To celebrate this once a year occasion we have picked the following gift: [gift]. Enjoy.

msg.title: Congrats on the birth of your child
msg.body: Whooa well done and congratulations on the birth of [babyname] on [birthdate].
